text: mūsāgē janayā ohugen pasu va ovungē ābharaṇa tuḷin vasu pæṭavakugē hæḍayen yut yamak (namadinnaṭa) gattēya. eyaṭa gava han̆ḍakut viya. sæbævinma eya ovun saman̆ga katā nokarana bavat ovunaṭa eya ṛju man̆ga nopenvana bavat ovuhu noduṭuvō da? ovuhu eya (deviyan lesa) gattōya. tavada ovun aparādhakaruvan bavaṭa pat vūha
